books.author: by Brad Thor
books.description: As the counterterrorism operative Scot Harvath searches for the murderer of candidates to head a powerful, mysterious agency, he uncovers a plot with roots in the 18th century.
books.name: HIDDEN ORDER

books.author: by Catherine Coulter
books.description: After the F.B.I. special agent Griffin Hammersmith accepts Dillon Savich’s invitation to join him and Lacey Sherlock, Hammersmith’s sister is savagely beaten.
books.name: BOMBSHELL

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by James Patterson and Howard Roughan
books.description: As he investigates the murder of a pair of newlyweds, the F.B.I. agent John O’Hara, last seen in “Honeymoon” (2005), is targeted by a serial killer.
books.name: SECOND HONEYMOON

books.author: by Khaled Hosseini
books.description: A multigenerational family saga centers on a brother and sister born in Afghanistan.
books.name: AND THE MOUNTAINS ECHOED

books.author: by Sue Grafton
books.description: The first of the Kinsey Millhone Alphabet mysteries, originally published in 1982.
books.name: A IS FOR ALIBI

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: The truth about Dean Holder is revealed in this retelling of the story of “Hopeless” from Dean’s point of view.
books.name: LOSING HOPE

books.author: by Christina Lauren
books.description: Picking up the story of Bennett Ryan and Chloe Mills where “Beautiful Bastard” left off.
books.name: BEAUTIFUL BITCH

books.author: by Neil Gaiman
books.description: A middle-aged man recalls his lonely boyhood and his friendship with a remarkable girl.
books.name: THE OCEAN AT THE END OF THE LANE

books.author: by Tanya Anne Crosby, Danelle Harmon, Lauren Royal and Cynthia Wright
books.description: A set of four historical romance novels.
books.name: FOUR IRRESISTIBLE ROGUES

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Gail McHugh
books.description: In a sequel to “Collide,” Emily Cooper risks everything on her romance with the playboy Gavin Blake.
books.name: PULSE

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Eva and Gideon face the demons of their pasts and accept the consequences of their obsessive desires; a Crossfire novel.
books.name: ENTWINED WITH YOU

books.author: by Max Brooks
books.description: An “oral history” of an imagined Zombie War that nearly destroys civilization.
books.name: WORLD WAR Z

books.author: by Carl Hiaasen
books.description: A defrocked Miami cop turned restaurant inspector investigates a grisly murder.
books.name: BAD MONKEY
